interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Land Before Time XI - The Invasion of the Tinysauruses
Review Date: 2021/12/12
Store: Camryn Manheim  (Actor),     Michael Clarke Duncan  (Actor),     Charles Grosvenor  (Director, Producer)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    G    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Your favorite prehistoric pals are back in an all-new adventure filled with fun and laughter! This time around, the Tinysauruses invade the Great Valley to teach Littlefoot a big lesson about a little lie. Meet their new tiny friends and sing along to brand new songs. Featuring the unforgettable voices of Michael Clarke Duncan and Camryn Manheim,The Invasion of the Tinysauruses shows that heroes, friends and families come in all shapes and sizes!Bonus Content:', 'How Do I Find Things?', 'How Do I Find Things?', 'I Can Put This in My Computer?', 'I Can Put This in My Computer?', '"Creepy Crawlies" Sing-Along Song', '"Creepy Crawlies" Sing-Along Song', '"Creepy Crawlies Reprise" Sing-Along Song', '"Creepy Crawlies Reprise" Sing-Along Song', '"Girls & Dads" Sing-Along Song', '"Girls & Dads" Sing-Along Song', '"Imaginary Friends" Sing-Along Song', '"Imaginary Friends" Sing-Along Song', '"The Lesson" Sing-Along Song', '"The Lesson" Sing-Along Song', '"On Your Own" Sing-Along Song', '"On Your Own" Sing-Along Song', '"Friends For Dinner" Sing-Along Song', '"Friends For Dinner" Sing-Along Song', '"It Takes All Sorts" Sing-Along Song', '"It Takes All Sorts" Sing-Along Song', '"Standing Tough" Sing-Along Song', '"Standing Tough" Sing-Along Song', '"You Are One of Us" Sing-Along Song', '"You Are One of Us" Sing-Along Song', 'The Land Before Time Music Video', 'The Land Before Time Music Video', 'Recommendations', 'Recommendations', 'Amazon.com', 'The small-fry dinosaur friends are back for their ninth outing in this 77-minute movie, but this time they\'re not the littlest creatures in the Great Valley. A herd of miniature dinos is discovered when Little Foot tries to sneak some "tree sweets," but falls into the tree instead, knocking down all the blossoms. This gives the tiny herd easy access to the food, which they quickly devour and disappear. But instead of taking the blame, Little Foot inadvertently sends the prehistoric adults into a "get Frankenstein" kind of frenzy by blaming the little ones entirely for the loss of the harvest. The kids find the herd first, of course, and protect it from the adults until everyone settles down and accepts each other\'s differences. A subplot spotlights Cera and her adjustment to Dad dating Tria, a lady Triceratops friend from Dad\'s past come back to reignite old passions. (Ages 3 to 7)', '--Kimberly Heinrichs']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Kids & Family/3-6 Years, Kids & Family/Birth-2 Years, Science Fiction & Fantasy, Kids & Family, DVD Movie, Animation, Blu-ray Movie, Action & AdventureKids & Family/3-6 Years, Kids & Family/Birth-2 Years, Science Fiction & Fantasy, Kids & Family, DVD Movie, Animation, Blu-ray Movie, Action & Adventure   See more', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Full Screen, NTSC, Animated', 'Contributor': 'John Loy, Camryn Manheim, John Ingle, Jeff Bennett, Cree Summer-Francks, Miriam Flynn, Charles Grosvenor, Kenneth Mars, Rob Paulsen, Anndi McAfee, Michael Clarke Duncan, Aaron Spann, Aria Curzon, Tress MacNeilleJohn Loy, Camryn Manheim, John Ingle, Jeff Bennett, Cree Summer-Francks, Miriam Flynn, Charles Grosvenor, Kenneth Mars, Rob Paulsen, Anndi McAfee, Michael Clarke Duncan, Aaron Spann, Aria Curzon, Tress MacNeille   See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), French (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'G (General Audience)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.75 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Director': 'Charles Grosvenor', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Full Screen, NTSC, Animated', 'Run time': '1 hour and 21 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 16, 2011', 'Actors': 'Camryn Manheim, Michael Clarke Duncan, Aria Curzon, Jeff Bennett, Aaron Spann', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French', 'Producers': 'Charles Grosvenor', 'Studio': 'Universal Studios Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'John Loy', 'Number of discs': '1'}

Thomas & Friends: Blue Mountain Mystery the Movie
Michael Brandon  (Actor),     David Bedella  (Actor),     Greg Tiernan  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family
['Product Description', "When trouble strikes at the Blue Mountain Quarry, Thomas is sent to help his Narrow Gauge engine friends. While shunting and hauling, he discovers a little green engine hiding in the tunnels. Thomas is determined to get to the bottom of the mystery but discovering the truth is harder than he imagined! Will Thomas be able to help his new friend? Or will the little engine be sent away from Sodor forever? Find out in Thomas' most mysterious adventure yet, a movie the whole family will love!", 'Bonus Content:', 'Blue Mountain Hide & Peep Game', 'Blue Mountain Hide & Peep Game', 'Learn About Standard & Narrow Guage Engines', 'Learn About Standard & Narrow Guage Engines', '"Blue Mountain Mystery" Karaoke Music Video', '"Blue Mountain Mystery" Karaoke Music Video', '"Working Together!" Karaoke Music Video', '"Working Together!" Karaoke Music Video', ']]>', 'Amazon.com', 'Thomas the tank engine and his railway friends learn all about how rumors spread and the importance of getting all the facts before leaping to judgment in', 'Blue Mountain Mystery', '. When Sir Topham Hatt sends Thomas off to help the narrow-gauge engines at Blue Mountain Quarry after Paxton is injured by an unstable bridge, Thomas discovers a little green engine hiding in the tunnels. Some sleuthing reveals that green engine Luke is hiding because he once did something very bad; but what that something is remains a mystery. Thomas decides to find out exactly what happened, but his detective work yields some unintended consequences that just might get Luke thrown off of Sodor Island. This', 'Thomas & Friends', 'movie acquaints young viewers with the concept of standard and narrow-gauge tracks and engines and introduces new friends Owen the traction engine, who pulls heavy loads up the quarry incline; little green engine Luke; Merrick the sleepy crane; and track car Winston, who makes odd sounds and has a long way to go before becoming a really useful member of the railway. (Ages 2 to 6)', '--Tami Horiuchi']

Llama Llama Red Pajama
Jennifer Garner  (Actor),     Shayle Simons  (Actor),     Saul Blinkoff  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD
["Adventure and learning await in these heart-warming tales based on the award-winning book series by author and illustrator Anna Dewdney. Join Llama Llama, Nelly Gnu, Luna Giraffe, Euclid the Sheep and Gilroy Goat as they explore their safe, friendly hometown and make childhood memories. On this DVD, watch Llama Llama at his first sleepover with friends! Learn how to share on a play date with Nelly Gnu! Discover what makes Llama Llama's red pajamas so lucky and so much more!  Learn and play with Llama Llama and pals!"]

Christmas On The Range
Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Romance
["All Kendall Riley wants for the holidays is to save her family's ranch, but her longtime rival, small-town scrooge Brick McCree, has other plans in mind. When Brick's son, Clint, comes back to town, he is immediately drawn to Kendall and offers a helping hand. As a romance starts to blossom, Kendall's farm is sabotaged, leaving her to wonder about Clint's true intentions. Filled with action, adventure, redemption, and forgiveness, this is a modern-day Christmas story, that the entire family will love. Starring Erin Cahill (Saving Grace, Last Vermont Christmas), Nicholas Gonzalez (The Good Doctor, How to Get Away with Murder), A Martinez (Longmire, Santa Barbara), and Lindsay Wagner (The Bionic Woman, Grey's Anatomy)."]

Trolls: The Beat Goes On! - Seasons 1 - 4 [DVD]
Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Action & Adventure
['Trolls: The Beat Goes On! is an all-new chapter in the hair-raising adventures of DreamWorks Trolls, as Poppy, Branch and all of Troll Village keep the dance party raving in their fantastical forest home. Picking up where the blockbuster film left off, the Trolls are settling into a new era with Poppy as Queen. Bursting with their signature positivity, irreverence and a whole lotta original music, Trolls: The Beat Goes On! opens up the colorful world of Trolls for new adventures and a dance party around every corner.']

['Pixar Animation Studios proudly presents the adventure of a lifetime! profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** Passionate about family-friendly animated content that fosters nostalgia and holiday spirit, resonating with audiences of all ages.
- **Target Audience:** Primarily focuses on media designed for young viewers, emphasizing the role of films in strengthening family bonds during festive moments and shared experiences.
- **Purchasing Behavior:** Actively looks for deals on quality films, opting for well-reviewed options that provide captivating and enjoyable viewing experiences. Recent purchases highlight a commitment to engaging family titles that convey positive messages and encourage joyful interactions.
- **Content Preference:** Enjoys films appealing to both children and adults, with a strong interest in quality storytelling that promotes joy and lasting memories. Shows an openness to charming romantic elements within family-oriented entertainment.
- **Format Preference:** Values varied formats enhancing viewing experiences, placing importance on high-quality audio-visual elements and bonus features that enrich family movie nights.
- **Engagement Style:** Demonstrates enthusiasm through positive ratings and reviews, especially for media nurturing joyful connections. Recent interactions reflect a willingness to embrace diverse genres, emphasizing a family-friendly approach that ensures enjoyable experiences.

The user remains dedicated to enriching family moments with quality content while prioritizing value-driven purchasing that enhances enjoyment of shared entertainment.
